name: k-converter
description: Thousand to k Converter is a lightweight npm package designed to simplify the conversion of large numbers to k-metric notation. With this package, you can effortlessly convert numerical values from the thousands to the k-metric system, providing clarity and brevity in your applications. Whether you're working with financial data, statistical analysis, or any other domain requiring concise numerical representation, Thousand to k Converter offers an intuitive solution. Simplify your code and enhance readability with this versatile utility.
author: Ex App Dev
